entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
